title: Stormrazor + Hail of Blades MF is bugged.

embed.description: Watch League of Legends (TM) Client 31-5-2018 12 19 00 GIF on Gfycat. Discover more GIFS online at Gfycat.

body:
It makes that your first aa doesn't do dmg.

And checking it on the practice tool I've noticed that since lvl 1 to 9 isn't bugged but as you reach lvl 10 your first aa doesn't do dmg if you run Stormtazor and Hail of Blades.

Edit: Is not the lvl, the bug appears once she reachs 1.00 atack speed (or more) while having Hail of Blades and Stormrazor.

Something generally useful, I havent been in a game where hail of blades as won anyone a game.

Just played a ranked game on my other account and can confirm this. First aa consumes the stormrazor and does 0 dmg. Activating W (Strut) with Hail of Blades also causes the first aa to do nothing even without stormraizor. Tested this in pratice tool and seems to be consistant.
I was freaking out first because I tried on the pratice tool and it seemed that it wasn't bugged until I leveled up to lvl 10 and suddenly the bug appears, is kinda weird.
